title: Guns, Girls And Gangsters (1947) Mamie Van Doren, Gerald Mohr, Lee Van Cleef, Grant Richards

sources.title: Guns, Girls And Gangsters (1947) Mamie Van Doren, Gerald Mohr, Lee Van Cleef, Grant Richards
sources.description: Guns, Girls and Gangsters is a 1959 American FILM NOlR crime film directed by Edward L. Cahn starring Mamie Van Doren, Gerald Mohr, Lee Van Cleef, and Grant Richards.   You can find out more about this movie from this Wikipedia article .
